Comments_List: I gained an overview of the history of Brazil and Brazilian historiography, which was crucial to my program of study. I learned about different historiographical techniques as well.
A familiarity with the main issues across a complete sweep of Brazilian history.

Since this was a small seminar class with many auditors, perhaps the discussion could be a little deepened with more students reading for a grade. That said, even amongst the auditors the engagement with the material was high, and discussion was always very informative. Professor Schwartz is a deep well of fascinating information, and I am delighted that I got to study with him this semester.
We had good discussions in class and got a good sense of the field.
